alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Faulkner; Lonoke; Pulaski; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 10:29AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Cleburne, northwestern Lonoke, Faulkner, southwestern White and northeastern Pulaski Counties through 1100 AM CDT... At 1029 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Guy to near Conway. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Conway... Cabot... Beebe... Greenbrier... Ward... Vilonia... Mayflower... Austin in Lonoke County... Guy... Rose Bud... Enola... Twin Groves... Mount Vernon... Old Austin... Pickles Gap... Parnell... Gravel Hill... Sylvania... Springhill... Woolly Hollow State Park... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
